page.title: 04Traffic Survey
page.content:
We went to survey Newton Road and Cross Street to count the traffic passing through.The vehicles that we counted were commercial vehicles,buses, private cars,motor-cycles bicycles and others.The Eastern by-pass will relieve the traffic from Newton Road and the Western by-pass will relieve the traffic from Cross Street.From the survey we found out that Newton Road had more traffic passing through than Cross Street.Most people think that the Western by-pass should be built before the Eastern by-pass,because Cross Street gets VERY congested in heavy traffic, more than Newton Road as Cross Street is very narrow. We also agree that the Western by-pass should be built first.
BY JOANNE MARTIN & MANDY THOMPSON.
